title:
Who do you call to report pet waste violations to?

Who do you call to report leash law violations?

Do Cats Also Apply To The Leash Law?

I Have Problem Wild Cats In The Neighborhood & at Least One Person Is Feeding Them Do I Call Animal Control?

This Is In Between The Creeks Sub Division.

Thank You In Advance
text:
Call Animal Control, part of the New Hanover County Sheriff's
Office.
